EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Americas_Nurture_TFE731_Certified Engine Exchanges_JRD.201804_Americas_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Buy a Certified TFE731 Engine from Honeywell in 3 Easy Steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
Honeywell’s TFE731 certified engine exchange program is here to help connect you with a certified pre-owned engine to get you back into your jet and onto your next destination as quickly as possible.
We know what it’s like to fly commercial -- checking in, delayed flights, sharing your arm rest and waiting in baggage claim. Do you really want to do that again?
Besides, buying through our TFE731 certified engine exchange program is as easy as 1-2-3:
Step 1: Browse our certified, pre-owned inventory and choose the engine that’s right for your budget and aircraft. Step 2: Provide us with your contact information so that we can get in touch with you. Step 3: Talk to our GoDirect™ experts to complete your exchange or purchase.
What are you waiting for?
Browse our certified, pre-owned TFE731 inventory and choose the engine that’s right for you today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
